name: ReclaimInAppSdk
summary: The official Reclaim InApp SDK for iOS.
description:
ReclaimInAppSdk is a quick and secure way to integrate with
the Reclaim Protocol API. ReclaimInAppSdk is an embeddable framework
that handles Reclaim Verification's Claim Creation and Claim Submission.
prepare_command:
rm -rf ReclaimXCFrameworks # clear older xcframeworks
        rm -rf Build/PodCache
        mkdir -p Build/PodCache
        # Downloads and unzips the XCFrameworks on every pod install. Needs improvement.
        curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/App.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/App.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/App.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/App.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/cupertino_http.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/cupertino_http.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/cupertino_http.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/cupertino_http.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/device_info_plus.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/device_info_plus.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/device_info_plus.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/device_info_plus.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_inappwebview_ios.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_inappwebview_ios.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_inappwebview_ios.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_inappwebview_ios.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_secure_storage.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_secure_storage.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_secure_storage.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/flutter_secure_storage.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/Flutter.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/Flutter.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/Flutter.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/Flutter.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/FlutterPluginRegistrant.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/FlutterPluginRegistrant.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/FlutterPluginRegistrant.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/FlutterPluginRegistrant.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/fluttertoast.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/fluttertoast.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/fluttertoast.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/fluttertoast.zip')

curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/OrderedSet.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/OrderedSet.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/OrderedSet.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/OrderedSet.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/package_info_plus.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/package_info_plus.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/package_info_plus.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/package_info_plus.zip')

curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/reclaim_gnark_zkoperator.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/reclaim_gnark_zkoperator.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/reclaim_gnark_zkoperator.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/reclaim_gnark_zkoperator.zip')
curl -L 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/shared_preferences_foundation.zip' -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/shared_preferences_foundation.zip') && unzip -q -o $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/shared_preferences_foundation.zip') -d ./Build/PodCache && rm $(basename 'https://reclaim-inapp-sdk.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/ios/0.17.0/BinaryTargets/shared_preferences_foundation.zip')
